text: Heptobrachia is a genus of tube worms in the family Siboglinidae. == Species == * Heptabrachia abyssicola Ivanov, 1952 * Heptabrachia beringensis Ivanov, 1960 * Heptabrachia ctenophora Ivanov, 1962 * Heptabrachia gracilis Ivanov, 1957 * Heptabrachia subtilis Ivanov, 1957 * Heptabrachia talboti Southward, 1961 == References == Category:Sabellida
title: Heptobrachia
